title: Regulating Facebook and Google Pt 1: Markets
description: As digital platforms like Facebook and Google become globally powerful, some countries are investigating and even proposing legislation to regulate these companies. Building off a conference happening at the Stigler Center at the University of Chicago, Kate and Luigi speak with Fiona Scott Morton, a Professor of Economics at Yale, to interrogate these platforms from a traditional market structure perspective.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
